snippet: Starr, the Green Bay Packers Hall of Fame quarterback, is participating in a clinical trial using stem cells as a possible treatment for strokes.
abstract: Green Bay Packers Hall of Fame quarterback Bart Starr, who suffered two strokes and mild heart attack in 2014, is participating in clinical trial using stem cells as possible treatment for strokes; other NFL new noted.

byline.original: By KEN BELSON and THE ASSOCIATED PRESS

lead_paragraph: Starr, the Green Bay Packers Hall of Fame quarterback, is participating in a clinical trial using stem cells as a possible treatment for strokes.

headline.main: Bart Starr in Clinical Trial for Stroke Treatment
